snippet: GOLDBERG--Eleanore (nee Smit), 101, May 11, 2016, New Rochelle, NY. Brooklyn College (1934), career with the US Department of Labor. Vivacious and stylish, she loved theater, art, and travel. Beloved wife of the late Dr. S. N. Goldberg. Survived by her loving daughter, Joan Lee Goldberg, and Joan's life partner, Beat Keerl. Adored by relatives and friends. Contributions in her name may be made to The Michael J. Fox Foundation. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GOLDBERG, ELEANORE (NEE SMIT)
